en: GMX is a decentralized spot and perpetual exchange that supports low swap fees and zero price impact trades. Trading is supported by a unique multi-asset pool that earns liquidity providers fees from market making, swap fees, leverage trading (spreads, funding fees & liquidations) and asset rebalancing. Dynamic pricing is supported by Chainlink Oracles along with TWAP pricing from leading volume DEXs. For token holders: Tokenomics and Rewards For liquidity providers: GLP For traders: Trading
